newsitem.title: USA: Montgomery Ward to maintain current structure.
newsitem.headline: Montgomery Ward to maintain current structure.

text.p: Montgomery Ward & Co Inc said Thursday it would maintain its current structure of multiple distribution through the combination of retail specialty stores and direct marketing through The Signature Group.

It said there are no plans for separation of the retail company from its direct marketing subsidiary, The Signature Group. Chairman Bernard Brennan in a statement said, "Montgomery Ward is continuing to pursue its long-term growth plans. The business review we just completed was not undertaken to address any short-term needs.

"We were and continue to be interested in pursuing options that can maximize shareholder value and provide additional investments to continue our growth plans, such as a partial IPO of the Signature Group," Brennan said. "However, there are no specific plans at this time."
In conjunction with fund its plans, Montgomery Ward recently completed the renewal of its $300 million, one-year revolving credit and increased its total revolver commitments to over $1 billion.
